author: Richard Lawler
title: The Morning After: Apple's iPad turns 10
description: Hey, good morning! You look fabulous. Engadget's review of the first iPad ten years ago lauded its potential, even if the first version of tablet software couldn't do much for one's productivity. Since then, Apple has slowly gotten around to adding multitaski…
content:
Need something to watch this weekend?HBO's free streaming includes 'The Wire' and its Theranos documentary
